text:
Amalia Ivanovna pounded the table. 

“I am Amalia Ivanovna!” she shrieked. 

Katerina Ivanovna stood up, pale and trembling. 

“Do not compare your father to mine,” she warned. 

Amalia ran around the room, shouting, “Leave this house! I am the mistress!” 

She grabbed the silver spoons. 

The children cried. 

Sonia rushed to Katerina. 

“Don’t!” she pleaded. 

But Katerina pushed her aside. 

“Let me at her!” 

Suddenly, the door opened. 

Pyotr Petrovitch Luzhin entered, eyes sharp and watchful. 

Katerina rushed to him.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Amalia Ivanovna and Katerina Ivanovna engage in a heated confrontation over their social standings and the treatment of Katerina in her misfortune.
